title: banning people for satire
body: I got one of my account ban for being sarcastic and doing satire like jokes, wtf is riot thinking LOL

replies.body:
Do you have your chat logs? There are ways that satire and/or sarcasm could cross lines easily, and you may have crossed them.

Also, keep in mind that sarcasm and satire don't always carry through text well.
anyway Ty Djinn for replying to me. :) your advice will be really usefull. :) {{sticker:galio-happy}}

and I dont know how access to chat logs so if you could help me I would apreciate too, not garanted that I can find the logs tho , that ban didnt stopped me for playing the game that I love the most lol.

yh , sometimes people are butthurted and ask there premade friends to report  , even gaught conversation of premades talking about reporting me wene I just entered the lobby and the game never started , the guy got raged on by is friend for saying it public xD
Satire as a style is fine, you don't get banned for using it.  What you get banned for is the content.
yeah, shoulda try to see if who I am talking to is butthurted or not next time I do satire xD{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Logs or gtfo.
why are you still on my post , you didnt even read other comments I posted , I said idk how to get those logs

> [{quoted}](name=3AccBanRitoPls,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VVfVI1E6,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-11T04:16:59.294+0000)
>
> why are you still on my post , you didnt even read other comments I posted , I said idk how to get those logs

Yeah, no. You get them in the punishment notification.

Logs or bullshit.
you are just very toxic pls go away I said idk how to get logs
stop spamming my post ty {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
damn silence again <3
While he shouldn't say GTFO, he's asking for logs because generally, when banned, you're given examples of why you were banned or a list. Djinn covered that in the above post.
yh ik , but idk where to find logs
and can I know something ? like is the banning system automatic or checked by real people ? because I dont feel like real people watch those chat logs before banning players lol

If you log into the game client you should be greeted with a pop-up containing your chat logs from 1-3 games that are meant to serve as examples of the kind of behavior that led to your ban. If you can't find them then file a support ticket asking for them.
ok, but anyway I dont think I really mind about that acc anymore tho , ill just forget him and wene the ban will end ill go and recover it {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Yeah, but the logs?
Fun to see that its already easier to get an answer on league support forum that on heartstones support ahahaah
Show us satire please.

you get oneshoted in aram : says an ironic " kys :      ^)" in the allchat , and the guy respond "nope" so then your like: "owwwww :'( " and every one laught except the butthurted feeder on your team :)

> [{quoted}](name=3AccBanRitoPls,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VVfVI1E6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-10T04:03:23.968+0000)
>
> you get oneshoted in aram : says an ironic " kys :      ^)" in the allchat , and the guy respond "nope" so then your like: "owwwww :'( " and every one laught except the butthurted feeder on your team :)

I think asking someone to kill themselves is ban-worthy. Adding a smiley at the end of saying it doesn't make it sarcasm or a joke.

first , ty for replying its apreciated and 2nd , I said every one laughted :) , no one except the feeder on my team seen unhappy about that joke lol, the feeder was the kind of guy saying in all chat to report someone for being trash even if that guy was carrying lol, you know , just toxic players :)
I find it weird how reluctant you are to show us chat logs, you most likely tried being edgy and now you're so molded in your teen angst that you can't understand why you got banned.
you dont have to be aggresive you know :){{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Why would you attempt satire in a game of League?
because its my kind of humor and I like it. :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Just like there are good jokes.  There are bad jokes.  And then there are offensive jokes.

Jokes themselves do not get you banned.  Only the content of the joke will.

Same for sarcasm and satire.
yh ty ill take note of that for next time :)
It's either satire, or you're just straight up insulting people.

nah it was really satire , I think the guy in my team (a guy that was feeding and thought it was funny) reported me wene I said a joke to someone on the ennemy team . and because riot banning system accept  feeders and butthurted people it seems like it got me reported , or maybe saying "fuck" after you died is being toxic? like its not directed to anybody so idk how is it supposed to be concidered as being toxic .
